attacks.name: Hyrdocutter
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the amount of Energy attached to Kabutops ex. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads. You can't flip more than 3 coins in this way.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from Kabutops ex (remove 1 if there is only 1).
